__e: Steve, the power's off. I had the soup on the stove and the stove just stopped working.
See to the range and go to bed.
I do not say a woman's place is at the hearth and in the bed.
I didn't even know there was a stove under there.
I can't believe how beautiful that vintage stove is.
This is this, the kitchen, the table... everything has an order, a reason... without order, nothing...
